name: squarify
description: TypeScript/JavaScript implementation of Bruls et al.'s squarified treemap algorithm
author: Huy Nguyen <huy@huy-nguyen.com> (https://www.huy-nguyen.com/)

scripts.generate:typedef: tsc --declaration --outDir temp && mkdir -p lib &&  mv temp/index.d.ts lib/index.d.ts && rm -r temp
scripts.clean: npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:es && npm run clean:dist
scripts.build:lib: npm run clean:lib && rollup -c -o lib/index.js -f cjs --environment declaration
scripts.build:es: npm run clean:es && rollup -c -o es/index.js -f es
scripts.build:dist: npm run clean:dist && rollup -c -o dist/index.js -f umd --name squarify --environment minify --environment es5
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run typecheck && npm run build:lib && npm run build:dist && npm run build:es && npm run generate:typedef
scripts.validate: npm run test && npm run lint && npm run build
